mapper.sql: id, menu_title, menu_name, menu_icon_class, menu_type, menu_seq, menu_status
mapper.select: SELECT m.id, m.menu_title, m.menu_name, m.menu_icon_class, m.menu_type, m.menu_seq, m.menu_status, ms.id submenu_id, ms.menu_title submenu_title, ms.menu_name submenu_name, ms.menu_index submenu_index, ms.menu_icon_class submenu_icon_class, ms.menu_pid submenu_pid, ms.menu_type submenu_type, ms.menu_seq submenu_seq, ms.menu_status submenu_status FROM yurayura_sys_menu m LEFT JOIN yurayura_sys_menu_sub ms ON m.id = ms.menu_pid ORDER BY m.menu_seq, ms.menu_seq

SELECT DISTINCT substring_index( substring_index( a.menuName, ',', b.help_topic_id + 1 ), ',' ,- 1 ) menuName FROM ( SELECT GROUP_CONCAT( CONCAT( m.menu_name, ',', IFNULL(ms.menu_name, '') ) ) menuName FROM yurayura_sys_menu m LEFT JOIN yurayura_sys_menu_sub ms ON m.id = ms.menu_pid ORDER BY m.menu_seq, ms.menu_seq ) a JOIN mysql.help_topic b ON b.help_topic_id < ( length(a.menuName) - length(REPLACE(a.menuName, ',', '')) + 1 )

SELECT m.id, m.menu_title, m.menu_name, m.menu_icon_class, m.menu_type, m.menu_seq, m.menu_status, ms.id submenu_id, ms.menu_title submenu_title, ms.menu_name submenu_name, ms.menu_index submenu_index, ms.menu_icon_class submenu_icon_class, ms.menu_pid submenu_pid, ms.menu_type submenu_type, ms.menu_seq submenu_seq, ms.menu_status submenu_status FROM yurayura_sys_manager_role mr LEFT JOIN yurayura_sys_role_permission rp ON mr.role_id = rp.role_id LEFT JOIN yurayura_sys_role r ON mr.role_id = r.id LEFT JOIN yurayura_sys_permission p ON rp.permission_id = p.id LEFT JOIN yurayura_sys_menu_sub ms ON ms.menu_name = p.permission_belong_submenu_name LEFT JOIN yurayura_sys_menu m ON m.id = ms.menu_pid WHERE mr.manager_id = #{managerId} AND r.role_status = 1 AND p.permission_type = 1 AND p.permission_status = 1 AND ms.menu_status = 1 AND m.menu_status = 1 ORDER BY m.menu_seq, ms.menu_seq
